channel.title: Dicing help
channel.description: Hello, does anyone have a code for an Allstar Source (317) Dicing game? If so please let me know. I would highly appreciate it. Thanks!

item.title: Dicing help
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

DAn0194:

You don’t need help right now you are asking for someones code. If you are making a server than you have to code the content on it and not expect people to give you everything. Sorry if this sounds harsh but in the end you will become a better programmer if you try coding it yourself.

I understand what you mean, but I have never coded a dicing game before, and I need to see a code of dicing so I know how to do it.

Read full topic
